Description.Text: Reikartz Aurora Kryvyi Rih is a modern 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Kryvyi Rih. Highlights include a spa, indoor swimming pool and an excellent location close to Maksyma Hor'koho square. Kryvyi Rih is located in a rolling steppe and is known for its sweeping avenues and iron ore industry. Nearby places of interest include Heroiv Park and the Krivui Rog Orthodox Cathedral. Mudr'ona train station provides fast and easy access to other popular destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property with a glass atrium. Facilities include a sauna, steam room, gym, children's pool and a spa offering a range of treatments and massages. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 15sqm and decorated in a bright, modern style with light wood furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, satellite TV, a fridge and a work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The Aurora restaurant offers Ukrainian and European dishes in a charming and intimate setting, which features a terrace, while guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the cosy hotel bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
